post:
NORWEGIAN VIKING MADNESS IS BACK!

▪◾◼⬛Black Friday⬛◼◾▪

THIS REALLY HURTS, BUT SHOULD ALSO BE A TON OF FUN! :smiley:

Who are we?

Terrahost is a hosting provider founded in 2006 located in Sandefjord, Norway. We own and operate our own datacenters. The newest datacenter DC2 was completed in Q2 2018 and is built within an old air raid shelter. We also have DC1 rebuilt in 2018-2019 which is our Colocation facilities.

**Check out our latest datacenter here: [https://terrahost.no/datasenter](https://terrahost.no/datasenter)**

**LG:** http://lg.terrahost.no/
**AS Info:** https://bgp.he.net/AS56655
**BGP session:** Yes
**Recurring:** Yes
**TUN/TAP (OpenVPN):** Yes (add device creation to rc.local!)
**Wireguard:** Yes (add device creation to rc.local!)
**VAT removed:** Yes, VAT is removed for any foreign orders after login.

**Transits**
Altibox (AS29695)
Telia (AS12929)

**IX**
NIX1 - Oslo
FIXO - Oslo
**FSIX - Locally in our facilities, free 1G / 10G ports (https://fsix.no)**

XO to IXes in Oslo is available upon request.

**Points of Presence**
Terrahost, K10 (Sandefjord)
Verizon, HMG9 (Oslo)

----------------
**60% OFF LXC VPSes with RAID1 NVMe storage!**
**Use coupon code: A45237VSB6**

0.25GB RAM - 1 vCore - 30GB NVMe - 1TB @ 1Gbps - 9.08 EUR/year - [Order here](https://terrahost.no/bestilling?pid=3409 "Order here")

2GB RAM - 2 vCore - 30GB NVMe - 4TB @ 1Gbps - 27.22 EUR/year - [Order here](https://terrahost.no/bestilling?pid=3412 "Order here")
4GB RAM - 2 vCore - 30GB NVMe - 5TB @ 1Gbps - 43.10 EUR/year - [Order here](https://terrahost.no/bestilling?pid=3413 "Order here")

1 IPv4
1 IPv6 + /48 Subnet

Intel Core i3
4GB RAM
500GB HDD
